page.title: 11THE MARKET SURVEY
page.content: THURSDAY Horncastle market place lies in the centre of town. It has approximately twenty-eight stalls which sell numerous objects ranging from clothes and jewellery to fruit and vegetables. Wallpaper, fabrics and plants are also popular. Perhaps the most popular stall is the sweet stall, while birthday cards and pictures can be bought to decorate the home. SATURDAY On average there are only twenty stalls. These consist of three clothes stalls, a couple of bric-a-brac stalls, two plant and flower stalls and two fruit and vegetable stalls. There are also stalls for bed linen, belts, trousers, material, wool, birthday cards, cake and biscuits, beer and wine-making kits, poultry and eggs.
